before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"t9ta","text":"Note: When using NEBNext Poly(A) mRNA Magnetic Isolation Module E7490 with NEBNext library preparation kits, follow the protocol in the respective library prep kit manual or see Appendix A in the E7490 manual on neb.com. Modifications to elution buffer and volumes will need to be made at Step 26 to make the enriched mRNA directly compatible with the different library preparation workflows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":392}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ufkh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r0tb","text":"Note: For best results keep all the reagents used during the Poly(A) isolation except the NEBNext Oligo d(T)25 beads, on ice when not in use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csi9t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"afs1t","text":"The protocol has been optimized using high quality Universal Human Reference Total RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":87}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9490u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"v4tb","text":"RNA Integrity","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99p95","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d57vd","text":"Assess the quality of the Input RNA by running the RNA sample on an Agilent Bioanalyzer RNA 6000 Nano/Pico Chip. For Poly(A) mRNA enrichment, high quality RNA with a RIN score \u003e 7 is required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2lfu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blaae","text":"RNA Sample Requirements","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6373q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1l47m","text":"The RNA sample should be free of salts (e.g., Mg2+, or guanidinium salts, divalent cation chelating agents (e.g., EDTA or EGTA) or organics (e.g., phenol or ethanol). RNA must be free of DNA. gDNA is a common contaminant from RNA preps. It may be carried over from the interphase of organic extractions or when the silica matrix of solid phase RNA purification methods is overloaded. If the total RNA sample may contain gDNA contamination, treat the sample with DNase I to remove all traces of DNA (DNase is not provided in this kit). After treatment with DNase I the enzyme should be removed from the sample. Any residual activity of the DNase I may degrade the oligos necessary for the enrichment. DNase I can be removed from the extraction using phenol/chloroform extraction and ethanol precipitation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":48,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43kn5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ok89","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ftnhb","text":"The NEBNext Poly(A) mRNA Magnetic Isolation Module is designed to isolate intact poly(A)+ RNA from previously isolated total RNA. The technology is based on the coupling of Oligo d(T)25 to 1 μm paramagnetic beads which is then used as the solid support for the direct binding of poly(A)+ RNA. Thus, the procedure permits the manual processing of multiple samples and can be adapted for automated high-throughput applications. Additionally, magnetic separation technology permits elution of intact mRNA in small volumes eliminating the need for precipitating the poly(A)+ transcripts in the eluent. Intact poly(A)+ RNA which is fully representative of the mRNA population of the original sample can be obtained in less than one hour. The new protocol for poly(A) mRNA enrichment (Section 1, Express Protocol) enables comparable performance to our current protocol (Section 2, Standard Protocol) using a substantially faster and more streamlined workflow.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"c2q38","text":"Please refer to the product page on NEB.com for FAQs about this product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":72}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5cj4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vfgv","text":"Where larger volumes, customized or bulk packaging are required, we encourage consultation with the Customized Solutions team at NEB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8a7r3","text":"Please complete the NEB Custom Contact Form at www.neb.com/CustomContactForm to learn more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":29}],"data":{}},{"key":"1tvur","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3cpvf","text":"Application","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d9mue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tii5","text":"Isolation of poly(A)+ RNA transcripts from Total RNA for RNA library preparation and sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F67D2992DD0B11EEAE6E0A58A9FEAC02","url":"www.neb.com/CustomContactForm"}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"qj35","text":"Add   NEBNext Oligo d(T)25 beads per reaction to a 1.5 ml tube. If preparing multiple libraries, beads for up to 24 samples can be added to a single 1.5 ml tube for subsequent washes (use magnet NEB #S1506 for 1.5 ml tubes). The purpose of this step is to bring the beads from the storage buffer into the binding buffer. The NEBNext RNA Binding Buffer (2X) does not have to be diluted for this step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84mdo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eh7p8","text":"Remove the tubes from the thermal cycler when the temperature reaches hold at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":78,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"18cjp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"425jh","text":"Place the tubes on the magnetic stand at   for   or until the solution is clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dbk1p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a91o9","text":"Remove and discard all of the supernatant from each tube. Take care not to disturb the beads. Do not remove the tubes from the magnetic rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7lslk","text":"While still on the magnet, rinse the beads by gently adding   of NEBNext Wash Buffer to the tubes to remove unbound RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eti33","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qd97","text":"Remove and discard all of the supernatant from the tubes. Take care to remove all of the NEBNext Wash Buffer and do not disturb the beads that contain the mRNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi6qm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ib84","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2q6o6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":334,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"9pg4j","text":"Note: It is important to remove all of the supernatant to successfully use the RNA in downstream steps. Spin down the tube. Place the tube on the magnetic rack and with a 10 μl tip remove all of the NEBNext Wash Buffer. Caution: Do not disturb beads that contain the mRNA. Avoid letting the beads dry out before adding elution buffer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5kabl","text":"Remove the tubes from the magnetic rack.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m1p0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"431sk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":294,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1nrdr","text":"Note: Modifications to elution buffer and volumes will need to be made here to make the enriched mRNA directly compatible with the different NEBNext library preparation workflows. Please refer to Appendix A in the E7490 manual on neb.com and consult the appropriate manual for more information.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Starting Material: 1–5 μg* of DNA-free total RNA (Express Protocol)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"enqls","text":"Elute the mRNA from the beads by adding   of the NEBNext Tris Buffer, mix by pipetting 6 times and incubate the samples at   for  , then cool to  . steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7k2qb","text":"Assess the yield and the size distribution of the purified mRNA.
